title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Linear stability of spatially uniform state: Rayleigh-Benard convection, Couette-Taylor flow, Faraday crispations. Classification of Linear instabilities: stationary, oscillatory, structural instabilities with simple examples, Nonlinear patterns in spatially extended systems: Amplitude equations, method of multiple scales, Floquet theory, phenomenological models, Galerkin models, Eckhouse instability, competing patterns, Dynamics of dislocations
